price: Wͻfa no atorɔsɛm, na wͻdi wͻn apεdeε hunu akyi. Na asεm biara wͻ ne berε.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
